languages.text: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:be619d39ec424c9daec488acf25ae86b}Combat Locus Stratagem{/g}, the benefits of the targeted zone are quadrupled instead of being doubled.
languages.original_text: Когда персонаж применяет {g|f:be619d39ec424c9daec488acf25ae86b}стратагему: фокусировка{/g}, бонусы выбранной зоны умножаются на 4, а не на 2.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:be619d39ec424c9daec488acf25ae86b}Combat Locus Stratagem{/g}, the benefits of the targeted zone are quadrupled instead of being doubled.
Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:be619d39ec424c9daec488acf25ae86b}Combat Locus Stratagem{/g}, the benefits of the targeted zone are quadrupled instead of being doubled.
Whenever the wearer uses Combat Locus, the benefits of the targeted zone are multiplied by 4 instead of being doubled.

languages.text: 当装备者使用{g|f:be619d39ec424c9daec488acf25ae86b}基卫战略{/g}这个战略能力时，目标区域的效果不再翻为2倍，而是会变为4倍。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:be619d39ec424c9daec488acf25ae86b}Combat Locus Stratagem{/g}, the benefits of the targeted zone are quadrupled instead of being doubled.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者使用{g|f:be619d39ec424c9daec488acf25ae86b}基卫战略{/g}这个战略能力时，目标区域的效果不再翻为2倍，而是会变为4倍。

languages.text: 使用者が{g|f:be619d39ec424c9daec488acf25ae86b}戦闘の軌跡{/g}を使用すると、対象ゾーンの効果は2倍ではなく4倍となる。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:be619d39ec424c9daec488acf25ae86b}Combat Locus Stratagem{/g}, the benefits of the targeted zone are quadrupled instead of being doubled.

traits.locale_text: 着用者が戦闘の軌跡を使用するたびに、対象ゾーンの効果は2倍ではなく4倍となる。

languages.text: Cuando el portador usa {g|f:be619d39ec424c9daec488acf25ae86b}Estratagema de zona de combate{/g}, los beneficios de la zona objetivo se cuadruplican en vez de duplicarse.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses {g|f:be619d39ec424c9daec488acf25ae86b}Combat Locus Stratagem{/g}, the benefits of the targeted zone are quadrupled instead of being doubled.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador usa {g|f:be619d39ec424c9daec488acf25ae86b}Estratagema de zona de combate{/g}, los beneficios de la zona objetivo se cuadruplican en vez de duplicarse.
Cuando el portador usa Zona de combate, los beneficios de la zona objetivo se multiplican por 4 en vez de duplicarse.

languages.text: Setzt der Träger {g|f:be619d39ec424c9daec488acf25ae86b}Kampfort-Strategem{/g} ein, werden die Vorteile des Zielgebietes nicht verdoppelt, sondern vervierfacht.

traits.locale_text: Setzt der Träger {g|f:be619d39ec424c9daec488acf25ae86b}Kampfort-Strategem{/g} ein, werden die Vorteile des Zielgebietes nicht verdoppelt, sondern vervierfacht.

languages.text: Когда персонаж применяет {g|f:be619d39ec424c9daec488acf25ae86b}стратагему: фокусировка{/g}, бонусы выбранной зоны умножаются на 4, а не на 2.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur a recours à un {g|f:be619d39ec424c9daec488acf25ae86b}Stratagème Lieu de combat{/g}, les avantages de la zone ciblée sont multipliés par 4 au lieu d'être doublés.

languages.text: Takan kişi, {g|f:be619d39ec424c9daec488acf25ae86b}Çatışma Mevkisi Savaş Hilesi{/g} kullandığında hedeflenen sahanın sağladığı faydalar iki yerine dört katına çıkar.
